footer.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news and important announcements for students.

boffer.title: Cultural Attaché
boffer.description: Cultural Affairs Management for Students Studying Abroad

about.title: About the Cultural Attaché
about.description: The Cultural Attaché aims to support students and researchers by providing comprehensive educational and academic services, and enhancing collaboration between educational and cultural institutions to create an environment that encourages excellence and creativity.

cultural_advisor.title: Cultural Advisor
cultural_advisor.description: Manages cultural affairs and oversees the achievement of the mission's objectives.

assistant_financial_advisor.title: Assistant Financial Advisor
assistant_financial_advisor.description: Responsible for financial oversight and providing support in managing financial resources.

academic_affairs.title: Academic Affairs
academic_affairs.description: Responsible for monitoring students' academic progress and communicating with educational institutions.

public_relations.title: Public Relations and Media
public_relations.description: Handles cultural activities, coordination with universities and related organizations, and provides guidance and awareness services for students.

it.title: Information Technology
it.description: Handles technical infrastructure, internal networks, the mission's website, and various online services.

secretary.title: Secretariat
secretary.description: Handles mail, archiving, correspondence with universities, and other traditional secretarial tasks.

content.intro: Welcome to the website of the Cultural Mission, where we strive to provide the best services for students and researchers, and enhance cultural cooperation between countries. Our goal is to support academic and creative excellence and provide a stimulating educational environment that contributes to building a better future for all.
content.details: We also aim to build bridges of cultural communication with various entities to achieve common goals and enhance cultural dialogue. The mission is committed to providing all forms of support to students through academic advice and facilitating communication with universities and institutions.

culturalMagazine.title: Cultural Magazine
culturalMagazine.description: Read the latest edition of the Cultural Magazine.

culturalWeek.description: Details about the upcoming events of the cultural week.

officialEvents.title: Official Events
officialEvents.description: A list of official cultural events for students.
